message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid $9000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000.
I'm still interested in the product, but $11000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll offer $9500 for the product.
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to compromise, but I think $10500 is a fair price for this product.
I'm really interested in the product, but $10500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll offer $10250 for the product.
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10250. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my last offer, so I'll offer it to you for $10750.
